

## Simple Summary

This doc describes how to use TRON Shielded Transaction api.

### 1. Transfer from transparent address to shielded address

**Step 1. Call api: wallet/createshieldedtransaction to build the transaction**    
Method: Post  
Parameters:   
```json
{
	"transparent_from_address":"41A7D8A35B260395C14AA456297662092BA3B76FC0",
	"from_amount":100000000,
	"ovk":"c4b6e120ba97130d573de96cabb6bcb0836eaeee5686c1f59e6e653e42335879",
	"shieldedReceives":[{
		"note":
		{
		"value":90000000,
		"d":"0f54625d2b711abc80b3ab",
		"pkD":"f4a793720b0ac1628b931b81ac1dbe05fd71ca7f45c721526c5feea12574484a",
		"rcm":"45c874b34b0f1205f337ac8f7b4697368e1f5580ffb2d99929f36e5cf869df03"
		}
	}]
}
```
Return:  
```bash
{"txID":"223426e924569f84c9d7c2c9aad79c6e7f897b0736610d75a61154312c386847","raw_data":{"contract":[{"parameter":{"value":{"transparent_from_address":"41a7d8a35b260395c14aa456297662092ba3b76fc0","binding_signature":"03ebe978dfe3b379a0745188d3ce6cefff4b3a911ff7534f871b37c8cf7ed02f6a925c180e189b7b90fa1f3c790f575a35e887bc000b8747fc4ea7efa144000c","from_amount":100000000,"fee":10000000,"receive_description":[{"value_commitment":"51c447d0499bf19f1834342210a4542d52f02cae7892d48d5798f0e4bba11502","note_commitment":"4099c4886a8a152563fac239f0eb877aa1d2fbdc511e8a343d784c78a399345c","epk":"ec8ea658394e7c5504f964d4568186a1531317b59499a25a71218d08e1ed1628","c_enc":"","c_out":"1002b295cd2f9325d1259a19c553f131b5407d5e33cd8c1edc3f1ab8a52973e0bcf29935a52ef1bea46d9586ed7cfe0b519fb4438e7b035e5d134d19e2757549155c3b13d304b59e796745b261ebe12a","zkproof":""}]},"type_url":"type.googleapis.com/protocol.ShieldedTransferContract"},"type":"ShieldedTransferContract"}],"ref_block_bytes":"410d","ref_block_hash":"b5d8945ddcfd490f","expiration":1558667772000,"timestamp":1558667714810},"raw_data_hex":""}
```
**Step 2. Call api: wallet/gettransactionsign to sign (use the private key of the transparent address)**  
Method: Post  
Parameters:   
```json
{
"transation":
{"txID":"223426e924569f84c9d7c2c9aad79c6e7f897b0736610d75a61154312c386847","raw_data":{"contract":[{"parameter":{"value":{"transparent_from_address":"41a7d8a35b260395c14aa456297662092ba3b76fc0","binding_signature":"03ebe978dfe3b379a0745188d3ce6cefff4b3a911ff7534f871b37c8cf7ed02f6a925c180e189b7b90fa1f3c790f575a35e887bc000b8747fc4ea7efa144000c","from_amount":100000000,"fee":10000000,"receive_description":[{"value_commitment":"51c447d0499bf19f1834342210a4542d52f02cae7892d48d5798f0e4bba11502","note_commitment":"4099c4886a8a152563fac239f0eb877aa1d2fbdc511e8a343d784c78a399345c","epk":"ec8ea658394e7c5504f964d4568186a1531317b59499a25a71218d08e1ed1628","c_enc":"","c_out":"1002b295cd2f9325d1259a19c553f131b5407d5e33cd8c1edc3f1ab8a52973e0bcf29935a52ef1bea46d9586ed7cfe0b519fb4438e7b035e5d134d19e2757549155c3b13d304b59e796745b261ebe12a","zkproof":""}]},"type_url":"type.googleapis.com/protocol.ShieldedTransferContract"},"type":"ShieldedTransferContract"}],"ref_block_bytes":"410d","ref_block_hash":"b5d8945ddcfd490f","expiration":1558667772000,"timestamp":1558667714810},"raw_data_hex":""},
"privateKey":"7f7f701e94d4f1dd60ee5205e7ea8ee31121427210417b608a6b2e96433549a7"
}
```
Return:  
```bash
{"signature":["eeceecfcb4d4e90883daf61ab78014aad4cbf9b4a8c5e2f2b8cf828a44077b531db361fac9dcd10d8ee121501a5624e9dd4593f592a4a007c5335687deeb76fa01"],"txID":"223426e924569f84c9d7c2c9aad79c6e7f897b0736610d75a61154312c386847","raw_data":{"contract":[{"parameter":{"value":{"transparent_from_address":"41a7d8a35b260395c14aa456297662092ba3b76fc0","binding_signature":"03ebe978dfe3b379a0745188d3ce6cefff4b3a911ff7534f871b37c8cf7ed02f6a925c180e189b7b90fa1f3c790f575a35e887bc000b8747fc4ea7efa144000c","from_amount":100000000,"fee":10000000,"receive_description":[{"value_commitment":"51c447d0499bf19f1834342210a4542d52f02cae7892d48d5798f0e4bba11502","note_commitment":"4099c4886a8a152563fac239f0eb877aa1d2fbdc511e8a343d784c78a399345c","epk":"ec8ea658394e7c5504f964d4568186a1531317b59499a25a71218d08e1ed1628","c_enc":"","c_out":"1002b295cd2f9325d1259a19c553f131b5407d5e33cd8c1edc3f1ab8a52973e0bcf29935a52ef1bea46d9586ed7cfe0b519fb4438e7b035e5d134d19e2757549155c3b13d304b59e796745b261ebe12a","zkproof":""}]},"type_url":"type.googleapis.com/protocol.ShieldedTransferContract"},"type":"ShieldedTransferContract"}],"ref_block_bytes":"410d","ref_block_hash":"b5d8945ddcfd490f","expiration":1558667772000,"timestamp":1558667714810},"raw_data_hex":""}
```
**Step 3. Call api: wallet/broadcasttransaction to broadcast the transaction**  
Method: Post  
Parameters:   
```bash
{"signature":["30696ff3ebc18d486c4a9c8e0eb3a0bcae62714c8d87a2b40f84e4c31659f3845ffdc983d712646910c103ce7df9f005d7ba11fd929d6ee37fab24ea23b0d28801"],"txID":"aa418f41126f55bf5951560757ada33ba7fae5a58a662a76a2ae782a5440e005","raw_data":{"contract":[{"parameter":{"value":{"transparent_from_address":"41a7d8a35b260395c14aa456297662092ba3b76fc0","binding_signature":"6ae300b5ebf958055c771674437a1e2653605a1800f2e0e7227f8534ad7ea3214ca777eeee2a1f698f8424e3739f44d7edf2b4ae1321adef6b2ef51d08ee3102","from_amount":100000000,"fee":10000000,"receive_description":[{"value_commitment":"8ef2e4b4b9041cb0bc71506cc7bdf8c75dc033f4ab3d237311c55003a60a6c96","note_commitment":"4099c4886a8a152563fac239f0eb877aa1d2fbdc511e8a343d784c78a399345c","epk":"37aeb6b5359fc5bc565d45d11c64daf881396a32259fddc6b6b3ef7b4399418c","c_enc":"","c_out":"cda3aaa485941a411289fd3f8e6011a7bcc287fd2cd3875426f2ee9c96ecad34f86f4e48c4d11a3852c786b7236be0575500e08ef4b74962b79c0a0b382e8e5b1aa0fb281157e99ceef9bdd60f5f6cb3","zkproof":""}]},"type_url":"type.googleapis.com/protocol.ShieldedTransferContract"},"type":"ShieldedTransferContract"}],"ref_block_bytes":"42cd","ref_block_hash":"fcd7e589f29f95cb","expiration":1558669158000,"timestamp":1558669100894},"raw_data_hex":""}
```
Return:
```bash
{"result": true}
```

### 2. Transfer from shielded address to shielded address  

**Step 1. Call api: wallet/getmerkletreevoucherinfo to get the voucher of the shield address, this info will be used when create shielded transaction**  
Method: Post  
Parameter:  
```json
{
	"out_points":[{
		"hash":"aa418f41126f55bf5951560757ada33ba7fae5a58a662a76a2ae782a5440e005",
		"index":0
	}]
}
```
Return:  
```bash
{"vouchers": [{"tree": {"left": {"content": "4099c4886a8a152563fac239f0eb877aa1d2fbdc511e8a343d784c78a399345c"}},"rt": "c87687c4fb170b698b17a25d004e2ec8ee9037554a52627fcf6a5a509ca2e968"}],"paths": [""]}
```
**Step 2. Call api: wallet/createshieldedtransaction to create transaction**
Method: Post  
Parameter:  
```json
{
    "ask": "8980f8ec1c046e1bfe6e23b8105ec5962ebecb27d24706821c11dcf045c6700b",
    "nsk": "670b2efbe934f5a747303bc6a77646fa0b2fd921d2bfe10bed4542e18ed13f0c",
    "ovk": "f8cf1af6caf395bb503ac84b222ad33b642055f86c0342f146ad468ddf89f8fa",
    "shieldedSpends": [
        {
            "note": {
                "value": 90000000,
                "d": "1be411ac034c07183bdd6c",
                "pkD": "bca266124065716aba62a91b9622503e60275ebdfe93b15c7f94474be2f4a8f2",
                "rcm": "3ee9d41e3dd7a5e62dfb820ccac4e48bf5a78377d2c790a9b9758c31f9d16507"
            },
            "alpha": "db7d16ea2e04be00b91bce443aad4d3aa2f5e8ea75761da4ea700083b7174e08",
            "voucher": {
                "tree": {
                    "left": {
                        "content": "bf923d2ba80f08cc31565c0b0b3a4fd7a01c8e80770416c4e4a29b5eef12982b"
                    }
                },
                "rt": "afaa9daf0fa1fba5e2d2862751bc548bc77aa9953fcb4e8498c9664164ea6852"
            },
             "path":""
        }
    ],
    "shieldedReceives": [
        {
            "note": {
                "value": 80000000,
                "d": "14d38f082f8cd74e265499",
                "pkD": "ccfcf7e0cb3a0ec19ee664fbedafc6ad80cd6db5c808736ab22632e407803249",
                "rcm": "7adf6066d7094d70e539602fbf799e437f0f078c0bca58d160fd005680163b04"
            }
        }
    ]
}
```
Return:   
```bash

```
**Step 3. Call api: wallet/broadcasttransaction to broadcast this transaction(no need to sign this transaction)**  
Method: Post  
Parameter:  
```json

```
Return:  
```bash
```

### 3. Transfer from shielded address to transparent address  

**Step 1. Call api: wallet/getmerkletreevoucherinfo to get the voucher of the shield address, this info will be used when create shielded transaction**  
Method: Post  
Parameter:   
```json

```
Return:  
```bash
```

**Step 2. Call api: wallet/createshieldedtransaction to create transaction**
Method: Post  
Parameter:  
```json

```
Return:  
```bash
```

**Step 3. Call api: wallet/broadcasttransaction to broadcast this transaction(no need to sign this transaction)**  
Method: Post  
Parameter:  
```json

```
Return:
```bash
```
